thread.title: Politicians react to a potential House Speaker Paul Ryan
thread.title_full: Politicians react to a potential House Speaker Paul Ryan - CNNPolitics.com

author: Eli Watkins, CNN
title: Politicians react to a potential House Speaker Paul Ryan
text:
Washington (CNN) In the aftermath of Rep. Paul Ryan's announcement that he would be willing to serve as House speaker if three key GOP conference groups supported him, several politicians took to social media to share the news and react to Ryan's prospective candidacy.
[ View the story "Politicians react to Paul Ryan's announcement " on Storify ] Follow @CNNpolitics
